title.narrative: Forest Information to Support Public and Private Sectors in Management Initiatives

description.narrative: Finance the generation and dissemination of forest information to support public and private sectors in managing initiatives to conserve and enhance forest resources in the Cerrado biome

participating-org.narrative: Inter-American Development Bank, Inter-American Investment Corporation and Multilateral Investment Fund

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
